name: LIVE NATION ENTERTAINMENT, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Regulatory and legislative issues related to the entertainment industry.  Consumer protection and legislation related to the primary ticketing market.
Issues related to live event venues and flight restrictions
Issues related to transparency and accountability to ticket sales pricing; H.R. 3248/S. 1850 (116th Congress).
